parameters.name: Bucket
parameters.description: The bucket that stores the data cache. Default value: default.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum entries of query results that are allowed to be displayed. Valid values: 1 to 20. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The query token. Set the value to the NextToken value that is returned in the previous call.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The virtual host (vHost) directory in which the data cache resides.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the data caches that you want to query.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the data cache belongs.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are attached to the data cache.
